text: Goosebumps is a 2015 American fantasy horror comedy movie. It was based on the children's book series of the same name by R.L. Stine. It is directed by Rob Letterman and produced by Deborah Forte and Neal H. Moritz. It was written by Darren Lemke with music by Danny Elfman. It was made by Columbia Pictures and Sony Pictures Animation. The movie stars Jack Black, Dylan Minnette, Odeya Rush, Amy Ryan, Halston Sage, Ryan Lee, and Jillian Bell. It was filmed in Atlanta, Georgia. The movie is set in present-day Delaware. It was released on October 16, 2015 to mostly positive reviews. It earned $156 million. It received nominations for the Las Vegas Film Critics SocietyLas Vegas Film Critics Go All In on Creed, Beasts of No Nation; Snub Saoirse Ronan, Carol for Best Family Film and the Visual Effects Society for Outstanding Visual Effects in a Special Venue Project. On September 2, 2015, it was reported that a sequel was in the works. Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween was released on October 12, 2018. ==Cast== Dylan Minnette as Zach Cooper Jack Black as R.L. Stine Odeya Rush as Hannah Fairchild. title: Goosebumps (movie)
